tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/-- Egorov's theorem for finite measure spaces. -/
theorem tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto' [FiniteMeasure μ] (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n))
    (hg : strongly_measurable g)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x))))
    {ε : exprℝ} (hε : 0 < ε) :
    ∃ t, MeasurableSet t ∧ μ t ≤ ENNReal.ofReal ε ∧ TendstoUniformlyOn f g atTop («expr ᶜ» t) :=
  by
  obtain ⟨t, _, ht, htendsto⟩ :=
    tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto hf hg MeasurableSet.univ (measure_ne_top μ univ) _ hε
  · refine' ⟨_, ht, _⟩
    rwa [compl_eq_univ_diff]
  · filter_upwards [hfg]with _ htendsto _ using htendsto
#align tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto' tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto'
tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Basic.lean:635:2: warning: expanding binder collection (t «expr ⊆ » s) -/
/-- **Egorov's theorem**: If `f : ι → α → β` is a sequence of strongly measurable functions that
converges to `g : α → β` almost everywhere on a measurable set `s` of finite measure,
then for all `ε > 0`, there exists a subset `t ⊆ s` such that `μ t ≤ ε` and `f` converges to `g`
uniformly on `s \ t`. We require the index type `ι` to be countable, and usually `ι = ℕ`.

In other words, a sequence of almost everywhere convergent functions converges uniformly except on
an arbitrarily small set. -/
theorem tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n)) (hg : strongly_measurable g)
    (hsm : MeasurableSet s) (hs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x))))
    {ε : exprℝ} (hε : 0 < ε) :
    ∃ (t : _)(_ : t ⊆ s), MeasurableSet t ∧ μ t ≤ ENNReal.ofReal ε ∧ TendstoUniformlyOn f g atTop (s \ t) :=
  ⟨egorov.Union_not_convergent_seq hε hf hg hsm hs hfg, egorov.Union_not_convergent_seq_subset hε hf hg hsm hs hfg,
    egorov.Union_not_convergent_seq_measurable_set hε hf hg hsm hs hfg,
    egorov.measure_Union_not_convergent_seq hε hf hg hsm hs hfg,
    egorov.tendsto_uniformly_on_diff_Union_not_convergent_seq hε hf hg hsm hs hfg⟩
#align tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto tendsto_uniformly_on_of_ae_tendsto
tendsto_uniformly_on_diff_Union_not_conv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem tendsto_uniformly_on_diff_Union_not_convergent_seq (hε : 0 < ε) (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n))
    (hg : strongly_measurable g) (hsm : MeasurableSet s) (hs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x)))) :
    TendstoUniformlyOn f g atTop (s \ egorov.Union_not_convergent_seq hε hf hg hsm hs hfg) :=
  by
  rw [Metric.tendstoUniformlyOn_iff]
  intro δ hδ
  obtain ⟨N, hN⟩ := exists_nat_one_div_lt hδ
  rw [eventually_at_top]
  refine' ⟨egorov.not_convergent_seq_lt_index (half_pos hε) hf hg hsm hs hfg N, fun n hn x hx => _⟩
  simp only [mem_diff, egorov.Union_not_convergent_seq, not_exists, mem_Union, mem_inter_iff, not_and,
    exists_and_left] at hx
  obtain ⟨hxs, hx⟩ := hx
  specialize hx hxs N
  rw [egorov.mem_not_convergent_seq_iff] at hx
  push_neg  at hx
  rw [dist_comm]
  exact lt_of_le_of_lt (hx n hn) hN
#align tendsto_uniformly_on_diff_Union_not_convergent_seq tendsto_uniformly_on_diff_Union_not_convergent_seq
not_convergent_seq_measurable_set:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `strongly_measurable_of -/
theorem not_convergent_seq_measurable_set [preorder ι] [Countable ι] (hf : ∀ n, (strongly_measurable_of m) (f n))
    (hg : strongly_measurable g) : MeasurableSet (not_convergent_seq f g n j) :=
  MeasurableSet.unionᵢ fun k =>
    MeasurableSet.unionᵢ fun hk => strongly_measurable.measurable_set_lt strongly_measurable_const <| (hf k).dist hg
#align not_convergent_seq_measurable_set not_convergent_seq_measurable_set
not_convergent_seq_lt_index_spec:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem not_convergent_seq_lt_index_spec (hε : 0 < ε) (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n)) (hg : strongly_measurable g)
    (hsm : MeasurableSet s) (hs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x))))
    (n : ℕ) :
    μ (s ∩ not_convergent_seq f g n (not_convergent_seq_lt_index hε hf hg hsm hs hfg n)) ≤
      ENNReal.ofReal (ε * 2⁻¹ ^ n) :=
  Classical.choose_spec <| exists_not_convergent_seq_lt hε hf hg hsm hs hfg n
#align not_convergent_seq_lt_index_spec not_convergent_seq_lt_index_spec
not_convergent_seq_antitone:
theorem not_convergent_seq_antitone [preorder ι] : Antitone (not_convergent_seq f g n) := fun j k hjk =>
  unionᵢ₂_mono' fun l hl => ⟨l, le_trans hjk hl, Subset.rfl⟩
#align not_convergent_seq_antitone not_convergent_seq_antitone
mem_not_convergent_seq_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Kexing Ying. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Kexing Ying
-/
theorem mem_not_convergent_seq_iff [preorder ι] {x : α} :
    x ∈ not_convergent_seq f g n j ↔ ∃ (k : _)(hk : j ≤ k), 1 / (n + 1 : exprℝ) < dist (f k x) (g x) :=
  by
  simp_rw [not_convergent_seq, mem_Union]
  rfl
#align mem_not_convergent_seq_iff mem_not_convergent_seq_iff
measure_not_convergent_seq_tendsto_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem measure_not_convergent_seq_tendsto_zero [SemilatticeSup ι] [Countable ι] (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n))
    (hg : strongly_measurable g) (hsm : MeasurableSet s) (hs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x))))
    (n : ℕ) : Tendsto (fun j => μ (s ∩ not_convergent_seq f g n j)) atTop ((nhds) 0) :=
  by
  cases isEmpty_or_nonempty ι
  · have : (fun j => μ (s ∩ not_convergent_seq f g n j)) = fun j => 0 := by simp only [eq_iff_true_of_subsingleton]
    rw [this]
    exact tendsto_const_nhds
  rw [← measure_inter_not_convergent_seq_eq_zero hfg n, inter_Inter]
  refine'
    tendsto_measure_Inter (fun n => hsm.inter <| not_convergent_seq_measurable_set hf hg)
      (fun k l hkl => inter_subset_inter_right _ <| not_convergent_seq_antitone hkl)
      ⟨h.some, (lt_of_le_of_lt (measure_mono <| inter_subset_left _ _) (lt_top_iff_ne_top.2 hs)).ne⟩
#align measure_not_convergent_seq_tendsto_zero measure_not_convergent_seq_tendsto_zero

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , » -/
theorem measure_inter_not_convergent_seq_eq_zero [SemilatticeSup ι] [Nonempty ι]
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x))))
    (n : ℕ) :
    μ
        (s ∩
          «expr⋂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋂ , »"
            (not_convergent_seq f g n j)) =
      0 :=
  by
  simp_rw [Metric.tendsto_atTop, ae_iff] at hfg
  rw [← nonpos_iff_eq_zero, ← hfg]
  refine' measure_mono fun x => _
  simp only [mem_inter_iff, mem_Inter, ge_iff_le, mem_not_convergent_seq_iff]
  push_neg
  rintro ⟨hmem, hx⟩
  refine' ⟨hmem, 1 / (n + 1 : exprℝ), Nat.one_div_pos_of_nat, fun N => _⟩
  obtain ⟨n, hn₁, hn₂⟩ := hx N
  exact ⟨n, hn₁, hn₂.le⟩

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem measure_Union_not_convergent_seq (hε : 0 < ε) (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n)) (hg : strongly_measurable g)
    (hsm : MeasurableSet s) (hs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x)))) :
    μ (Union_not_convergent_seq hε hf hg hsm hs hfg) ≤ ENNReal.ofReal ε :=
  by
  refine'
    le_trans (measure_Union_le _)
      (le_trans (ENNReal.tsum_le_tsum <| not_convergent_seq_lt_index_spec (half_pos hε) hf hg hsm hs hfg) _)
  simp_rw [ENNReal.ofReal_mul (half_pos hε).le]
  rw [ENNReal.tsum_mul_left, ← ENNReal.ofReal_tsum_of_nonneg, inv_eq_one_div, tsum_geometric_two, ←
    ENNReal.ofReal_mul (half_pos hε).le, div_mul_cancel ε two_ne_zero]
  · exact le_rfl
  · exact fun n => pow_nonneg (by norm_num) _
  · rw [inv_eq_one_div]
    exact summable_geometric_two

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/

theorem exists_not_convergent_seq_lt (hε : 0 < ε) (hf : ∀ n, strongly_measurable (f n)) (hg : strongly_measurable g)
    (hsm : MeasurableSet s) (hs : μ s ≠ ennreal.top)
    (hfg :
      «expr∀ᵐ ∂ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᵐ ∂ , »" μ
        (x ∈ s → Tendsto (fun n => f n x) atTop ((nhds) (g x))))
    (n : ℕ) : ∃ j : ι, μ (s ∩ not_convergent_seq f g n j) ≤ ENNReal.ofReal (ε * 2⁻¹ ^ n) :=
  by
  obtain ⟨N, hN⟩ :=
    (ENNReal.tendsto_atTop ENNReal.zero_ne_top).1 (measure_not_convergent_seq_tendsto_zero hf hg hsm hs hfg n)
      (ENNReal.ofReal (ε * 2⁻¹ ^ n)) _
  · rw [zero_add] at hN
    exact ⟨N, (hN N le_rfl).2⟩
  · rw [gt_iff_lt, ENNReal.ofReal_pos]
    exact mul_pos hε (pow_pos (by norm_num) n)
